brainly_data.question: Jani is an 18-year old college freshman. during the past month, she has missed most of her classes because she has trouble getting out of bed in the morning. she can't concentrate, and she isn't doing her homework. she blames herself for all this; she is convinced that she is too stupid and lazy to do ever do well in college, and she is going to fail in everything she tries. jani's symptoms are most consistent with those seen in:
brainly_data.subject: Social studies

all_answers.question: Jani is an 18-year old college freshman. during the past month, she has missed most of her classes because she has trouble getting out of bed in the morning. she can't concentrate, and she isn't doing her homework. she blames herself for all this; she is convinced that she is too stupid and lazy to do ever do well in college, and she is going to fail in everything she tries. jani's symptoms are most consistent with those seen in:
all_answers.subject: Social studies
all_answers.text:
Jani's symptoms are most consistent with those seen in Major Depressive Disorder (MDD). MDD is a mental disorder that is characterized by its symptoms include a low mood, low self-esteem, little ability to feel interested or pleasure and a negative perspective of the future. In patients with MDD, it is common for the symptoms to be stronger in the morning and there is a lot of somnolence and devaluation.

I hope my answer can help you.
